GroupDescription: Admin can create new group policy through this option. System will display a screen with 3 tabs; Details, Policies, Users. Create Group will be a 3-step workflow. By default, the Details tab will appear selected. The Policies and Users tab will also be enabled.Admin can create new group policy through this option.
